name: MHUBAVSkill
0:
”Alexa, Pause Bluray”
”Alexa, turn down the volume by 5 on the Kitchen”
”Alexa, mute the kitchen”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This MHUB AV skill is compatible with HDANYWHERE’s (HDA) MHUB systems and you must have MHUB-OS 8.04 installed (or higher) in order to work. This skill will require account linking and you will need to provide your HDA Cloud details to link accounts. 

Ask Alexa to turn on or off your TV, change volume levels, change the channel and pause/play a Bluray.


Some example requests:

"Alexa, turn on the Kitchen"*
"Alexa, change the channel to 101"*
"Alexa, pause Bluray"*

All of these functions are entirely configurable and will require some initial configuration inside MHUB-OS first. For full documentation and how to get the most out of Alexa, please visit our support site http://support.hdanywhere.com

*Supported uControl Pack must be installed in MHUB-OS
